page.title: 20SUMMARY
page.content: THE AREA SURVEYED INCLUDES THE WESTERN OUTSKIRTS OF THE TOWN OF NEATH,THOUGH EACH DISTRICT MAINTAINS ITS OWN IDENTITY. RECENT YEARS(LAST 20)HAVE SEEN LARGE GROWTHS IN THE VARIOUS COMMUNITIES OWING TO EXTENSIVE PRIVATE AND LOCAL AUTHORITY BUILDING PROGRAMMES,WHILE STILL RETAINING A SEMI-RURAL ENVIRONMENT. WITH THE DECLINE OF LOCAL HEAVY INDUSTRY,THE COMMUNITY IS LIKELY TO CHANGE EQUALLY AS DRAMATICALLY IN THE FUTURE. ...................................... THESE SCHOOLS UNDERTOOK THE SURVEY:- {WAUNCEIRCH PRIMARY_MR.E.PORTER {BLAENHONDDAN PRIMARY_MR.S.R.JEWELL {CATWG PRIMARY_MR.M.DAVIES {DWR-Y-FELIN COMPREHENSIVE-MRS.J.JEWELL ......................................
